metadata.title: Atmospheric Forcing and its Spatial Variability over the Sea of Japan

creators.name: U.S. Navy, Office of Naval Research

metadata.description: To improve our understanding of the marine atmospheric boundary layer (MABL), its spatial structure and variability, and the resultant ocean surface forcing over the Japan/East Sea (JES).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To improve our understanding of the marine atmospheric boundary layer (MABL), its spatial structure and variability, and the resultant ocean surface forcing over the Japan/East Sea (JES).
